summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Seventeenth Avenue South, in the City of Seattle, from Beacon Avenue to Atlantic Street, by grading and curbing the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 362 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
